website_summaries.verdict: A good starter smartphone for youths or people upgrading from a traditional cellphone. It has a no-frills approach while offering the same Android apps as other phones.
pros: The water-repellant shell will keep the phone protected from rain and small spills
A fingerprint sensor adds an extra level of protection from theft
cons: Smaller screen than many other smartphones

customer_reviews.title: ... had the phone for a few weeks thing works great. Battery life is incredible
customer_reviews.text: Didn't think I'd go back to a Moto but ive had the phone for a few weeks thing works great. Battery life is incredible. Only complaint is I had to go to Verizon store to have my sim card cut down took 5secs and I was out the door happy
customer_reviews.author: Jarod L.

customer_reviews.title: beautiful phone and interface
customer_reviews.text: beautiful phone and interface. it is on the more solid side but honestly it's a good kind of solid. amazing battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Rosengarten

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for 1 year
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for a year, but now I can't answer my phone calls. I've tried every trick I can, but I think I'll have to buy a new phone as anyone who calls just hears ringing, even when I answer the phone. I can making outgoing calls, but only after several trys. My husband has the same phone, and his does it occasionally, but I think because I use mine more it's having more trouble. Sometimes my calls don't come through at all. Very frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Cagniforous

customer_reviews.title: It may be a good phone but this one is a lemon
customer_reviews.text: I hate this phone I brought it in July,this September 21 and people can't even heat me on the phone,now I have to buy a new phone because I use this phone for my hair salon business and my customer have to keep calling back until they can hear me. And the return window have expired so I have to buy another phone. I am so aggravated
customer_reviews.author: AP

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone
customer_reviews.text: Finally found a phone that is comfortable in my hand . Big Screen..wide for viewing photos and video and also good view for movies. Really Happy with the Moto E4 Plus.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry L

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice phone for the price. Long battery time. Nice features. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: R. Buttery

customer_reviews.title: Moto E4... Plus!
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality screen, good projected battery life, everything I liked about the E4... Plus more! Thank you for making food quality and affordable products, Motorola, it really means a lot to me.
customer_reviews.author: Tree Alone in the Rain

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Smartphone for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone for my daughter as a replacement to her last Smartphone that could not be recharged. Verizon Wireless helped her set yup this phone with no problems at all. The voice quality is very, and she used the phone for calling, texting and internet searches. The screen quality is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Pete H

customer_reviews.title: Good solid phone
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value for the price, large screen, long battery life. On the downside, not enough memory, will need to get a memory card but it is expandable up to 128 GB. The camera is ok but not great, but again it's a $100 phone, I'll take that over an expensive phone that you have to pay on each month. I would recommend it to anyone looking for a big, reliable Verizon phone.
customer_reviews.author: licanieb

customer_reviews.title: Amazing pictures
customer_reviews.text: Motorola is always my phone of choice and this one does not disappoint. The ease of use and rich bright colors are second to none. The front and back cameras take clear, sharp pictures that are easily shared. The battery life is great! This phone is a definite keeper.
customer_reviews.author: Jody Hartman

customer_reviews.title: I love this phone
customer_reviews.text: This is a great phone. Easy to use also. It also holds up to abuse very well
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: My favorite phone ever.
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone. It's not super super fancy but it does everything I need it to do and more. Perfect for me and my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value Cell Phone
customer_reviews.text: Amazing value for a budget priced cell phone. Battery life is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Do research on Pre paid. Great phone though
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone, camera is really good and easy to work. The storage is a little low but you can easily but a sd card in it. I suggest you don't have a plan already. The "prepaid" is for starting a new Verizon plan by yourself, It will not work if you already have a family plan. So just do your research because this won't work on my plan so i have to get a different one to work with my plan.
customer_reviews.author: Mathumas319

customer_reviews.title: Possibly stolen!!!  Verizon said it had not been scanned out.  No way to activate this phone.
customer_reviews.text: Received phone and took it to my local verizon store to have it activated. The sales rep tried to activate it and said that the unit had not been scanned out and was possibly stolen. There was no way to activate the phone. Returning the unit today. Had to buy a phone at the verizon store because i needed one today.
customer_reviews.author: Griller1

customer_reviews.title: Completely Useless
customer_reviews.text: Completely Useless with Google pop up after pop up after pop up. Motorola couldn't stop these pop ups and my Norton Security could not stop them. Apparently Google owns Motorola. Screw Google!!! I returned it. I'll never buy another Motorola phone again so help me!
customer_reviews.author: kowboydog

customer_reviews.title: good upgrade from an older model she had
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my wife and she loves it, good upgrade from an older model she had.
customer_reviews.author: Juan

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone
customer_reviews.text: at a very reasonable price. Why spend hundreds of dollars on a phone when this will suffice?
customer_reviews.author: Dennis M. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Moto or nada
customer_reviews.text: Absolute great phone. Moto phones are the easiest to use. Most places I looked for this phone they were sold out. Big 5.5 inch screen.
customer_reviews.author: Royyer B

customer_reviews.title: Good price for the quality
customer_reviews.text: Good phone for your money overall. Battery could last longer and the phone is a bit thick
customer_reviews.author: Alona Davis

customer_reviews.title: Best phone on prepaid
customer_reviews.text: I've had this phone for probably close to a year now, and I can still manage going 2 days without charging. I looked up all the specifications on camera quality, battery size/life, screen size etc and this phone surprisingly beats most of the competition. Because I'm on prepaid I don't have a warranty of any kind, and I'm a mechanic so my phone falls out of my pocket or accidently dropped in an engine bay or something else just as ridiculous and this phone has yet to crack or break (knock on wood). Even if it does break, it's one of the cheapest replacements to get! I recommend everyone to this phone.
customer_reviews.author: Mason Longwell

customer_reviews.title: NEVER AGAIN!!!
customer_reviews.text: I liked the look and size of the phone. However, this is the second phone (nothing different), a replacement since March of 2018. I paid for an extended warranty; this is not much good either. I put in a claim in June of this year and am still waiting. I want the money, not another of these. I will never buy a Motorola phone again!!
customer_reviews.author: G. D. Whitfield

customer_reviews.title: not sure
customer_reviews.text: I have a Moto E4 now,need a new phone because the security features stopped working.It will NOT take fingerprint anymore,voice recognizer half the time. don't know what to get. anybody got an Idea?
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

product_meta.title: Verizon Motorola Moto E4 Plus Carrier Locked Prepaid Phone
product_meta.description: With a vibrant, 5" HD display and a compact design, this is a phone you’ll want to hold onto. Never let spills, splashes, or a little rain get in your way. The Moto E uses a water-repellent nano-coating to protect your phone inside and out.
feature_bullets: Verizon Prepaid exclusive, the Moto E4 Plus 5.5-inch 720P LCD screen
Expandable Memory -Supports up to 128GB microSD Card (sold separately)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars41 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
specifications.Included Components: Quick Reference Guide, Wall/USB Charger, Product Safety & Warranty Brochure, 5000mAh battery, Moto E4 Plus
